Extract unique vertices

Source: R/00_vertex.R
sc_vertex.Rd

Extract unique vertices

sc_vertex(x, ...)

# S3 method for default
sc_vertex(x, ...)

# S3 method for SC
sc_vertex(x, ...)

# S3 method for ARC
sc_vertex(x, ...)

# S3 method for TRI
sc_vertex(x, ...)

# S3 method for TRI0
sc_vertex(x, ...)

# S3 method for PATH
sc_vertex(x, ...)

# S3 method for PATH0
sc_vertex(x, ...)

Arguments

x

model
...

passed to methods

Value

data frame of only the unique coordinates

Examples

sc_vertex(minimal_mesh)
#> # A tibble: 14 x 3
#>       x_    y_ vertex_
#>    <dbl> <dbl> <chr>  
#>  1  0     0    enboPv 
#>  2  0     1    vB3vnn 
#>  3  0.2   0.2  EqxrZ2 
#>  4  0.2   0.4  3SRogN 
#>  5  0.3   0.6  nL0pFc 
#>  6  0.5   0.2  GG10h8 
#>  7  0.5   0.4  zKauQn 
#>  8  0.5   0.7  X6VZjk 
#>  9  0.69  0    8qhKTc 
#> 10  0.75  1    KMn3zK 
#> 11  0.8   0.6  9p1Fyn 
#> 12  1     0.8  VS9iwV 
#> 13  1.1   0.63 TDaIpj 
#> 14  1.23  0.3  TxyU6G 
sc_vertex(SC0(minimal_mesh))
#> # A tibble: 14 x 3
#>       x_    y_ vertex_
#>    <dbl> <dbl> <chr>  
#>  1  0     0    o2VHxZ 
#>  2  0     1    611m5v 
#>  3  0.2   0.2  Y72FpI 
#>  4  0.2   0.4  xgyXOw 
#>  5  0.3   0.6  kdrKqa 
#>  6  0.5   0.2  NMGkHJ 
#>  7  0.5   0.4  2KiBv0 
#>  8  0.5   0.7  buLqlf 
#>  9  0.69  0    nr9kE1 
#> 10  0.75  1    tgiJuc 
#> 11  0.8   0.6  Ke15ro 
#> 12  1     0.8  UT44aO 
#> 13  1.1   0.63 zoFqSL 
#> 14  1.23  0.3  EQ9B0w
